Headline: Orange Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running with delays due to to a shortage of available staff; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running with delays due to a temporary shortage of available staff.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at LaSalle
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at LaSalle due to a report of smoke. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at LaSalle due to a report of smoke.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
